price: Pharaoh said, “If you have brought a sign, then bring it forth if you are truthful.”
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
